sourcing.label: Sourcing & Discovery
sourcing.description: Identify potential suppliers based on product requirements
actions: Search Alibaba, Global Sources, and industry directories
Check supplier ratings, certifications, and trade assurance
Verify MOQ, lead time, and production capacity
Compare 3-5 suppliers per product category

escalation.if_no_supplier_found: Expand search to trade shows and agent networks

templates.initial_inquiry: Hi, I'm sourcing {{product_type}} for our brand. Could you provide: (1) product catalog with specs, (2) MOQ and pricing tiers, (3) lead time for samples and bulk, (4) certifications available. Thank you.

sample_request.label: Sample Request & Evaluation
sample_request.description: Request and evaluate product samples from shortlisted suppliers
actions: Request 2-3 samples per shortlisted supplier
Specify exact requirements: color temp range, CRI, build quality
Track sample shipment and delivery
Document sample costs and terms

escalation.if_sample_delayed: Contact supplier for tracking update after 10 days
escalation.if_sample_fails: Request replacement or move to next supplier

evaluation.label: Evaluation & Scoring
evaluation.description: Evaluate samples against quality standards and score suppliers
actions: Test product against specifications (color accuracy, build, heat)
Score supplier on evaluation matrix
Compare all evaluated suppliers side-by-side
Select top 1-2 suppliers for negotiation

negotiation.label: Negotiation & Terms
negotiation.description: Negotiate pricing, terms, and finalize supplier agreement
actions: Negotiate unit price based on volume tiers
Agree on payment terms (30% deposit, 70% before shipment typical)
Confirm quality control process and inspection rights
Agree on packaging, labeling, and branding requirements
Establish defect rate tolerance and replacement policy

escalation.if_price_too_high: Counter with volume commitment or multi-product bundle
escalation.if_terms_unacceptable: Escalate to alternative supplier or negotiate split terms

templates.price_counter: Thank you for the quote. Based on our volume projection of {{qty}} units/month, we'd like to propose {{target_price}} per unit. We can commit to a {{months}}-month purchase agreement.

purchase_order.label: Purchase Order & Fulfillment
purchase_order.description: Issue PO, track production, arrange inspection and shipment
actions: Issue formal purchase order with all agreed terms
Process deposit payment
Schedule pre-shipment inspection (PSI)
Arrange freight forwarding and customs clearance
Track shipment to warehouse
Receive and verify inventory count

escalation.if_psi_fails: Hold shipment, request rework or replacement
escalation.if_shipment_delayed: Contact supplier and freight forwarder for updated ETA
